summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3417 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 9 and 10, David S. Maynard's Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue South and Occidental Avenue, extending from Yesler Way to Main Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42357, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
